Our_Dubai: Our Dubai Real Estate Agency's Support
offer: We offer you our support, from the beginning to the end of your project
mission: ALTAWOOS-ALTHAHABI's mission is to assist its clients in buying, renting, selling and investing in real estate in Dubai. Our team is composed of real estate professionals residing in Dubai, speaking English,French,Arabic and Spanish who’s providing individualized assistance to each client. We are by your side at every stage of your investment:
follow_up: follow-up after the contract is signed
selection: selection of the project that meets your criteria
negotiations: negotiations with developers on your behalf
A_Real_Estate_Agency_In_Dubai_that_knows: A Real Estate Agency In Dubai that knows The Land
If_we_are_able_to_guide_you: If we are able to guide you perfectly, it is because we master our environment. Since all our agents reside in the capital of the United Arab Emirates, we can attest that the real estate market in Dubai holds no secrets for us. We are well informed about new properties for sale, but also about the evolution and trends in prices. We are not only able to guide you, but also to negotiate for you
Each_profile: Each profile being different, we have at heart to discuss with you the nature of your project. Are you planning to settle in Dubai as an entrepreneur? You have found a job and are looking for the residence of your dreams? You have the ambition to invest in rental property in order to make your assets grow? The members of our real estate agency in Dubai will take into account your budget, your goals and your specific situation, to personalize their advice.The result is a strategic investment that is not only adapted to your project, but also meets your expectations
The_one_and_only_goal: The one and only goal of our real estate agency in Dubai? Your satisfaction. To this end, we deploy all the means at our disposal.
Our_mission: Our mission is to provide the best services for our client, here’s where you can find us
our_dubai: Our Dubai Real Estate Agency's Support.
we_are_well_aware: We are well aware of the difficulties involved in making a purchase from abroad. That's why we offer you our support, from the beginning to the end of your project. From the prospecting to the purchase, we take care of the key steps of your project! Let us represent you during the visits, but also during the negotiation and the signature on your behalf, in order to achieve the transaction you are hoping for. The members of our real estate agency in Dubai are also officially licensed by RERA 'the Dubai Real Estate Regulatory Agency'. We are committed to meeting your expectations in an efficient and relevant manner. Our watchwords? Excellence, listening and success.
